title: Fix Internet Identity blank authorization screen

requirements.text: Debug and fix the Internet Identity authorization page (id.ai/#authorize) that currently displays a blank white screen instead of the login interface with passkey/Google/Apple/Microsoft options

quotes: when i am opening sign in option its not showing to connect to the internet id
The Internet Identity authorization page (id.ai/#authorize) loads but displays a blank white screen

acceptanceCriteria: When users click the sign-in button, the Internet Identity authorization interface renders correctly
Users can see passkey, Google, Apple, and Microsoft login options
The authorization page no longer shows a blank white screen
Users can successfully authenticate using Internet Identity

requirements.text: Verify the Internet Identity component initialization and ensure the authentication flow properly displays in iframe/popup/window mode

quotes: Debug the Internet Identity component initialization and rendering
Verify the authorization URL configuration and iframe/popup setup

acceptanceCriteria: Internet Identity component initializes without errors
Authorization flow opens in the correct display mode (iframe, popup, or window)
The id.ai authorization URL loads successfully with proper configuration
Authentication state persists correctly after login

requirements.text: Ensure the Internet Identity authentication integration works correctly in both admin mode (rentiq-udaipur-x18.caffeine.xyz) and production mode (rentiq-udaipur.com)
acceptanceCriteria: Internet Identity login works on the admin domain (rentiq-udaipur-x18.caffeine.xyz)
Internet Identity login works on the production domain (rentiq-udaipur.com)
Both domains display the login interface correctly without blank screens
User authentication state is maintained correctly across both domains

constraints: Do not modify the useInternetIdentity.ts hook file (it is in the immutable paths list)
Maintain compatibility with the existing approval and authentication flow
Do not change backend authentication logic
Keep the existing Internet Identity integration pattern intact
nonGoals: Adding new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity
Changing the approval workflow or admin bootstrap functionality
Modifying the user approval request screen or pending state logic
Adding the Approval section to the admin interface (separate feature request)
